committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a reduced retirement annuity for a Member of Congress who remains in office after becoming 70 years of age.

summary.text: Provides for a reduced (by 25 percent) retirement annuity for a Member of Congress (other than the Vice-President) who remains in office after becoming 70 years of age. States that the annuity of a surviving spouse or child is to be computed without regard to such reduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a reduced retirement annuity for a Member of Congress who remains in office after becoming 70 years of age.
